about.title: About RTM Builders
about.description: At RTM Builders, we've built our reputation on delivering exceptional craftsmanship and reliable building services for over a decade. What began as a passion for quality construction has grown into a trusted local business serving homeowners and property developers alike. From minor repairs to complete renovations and new builds, we approach each project with the same commitment to excellence and attention to detail. Our experienced team works closely with you to understand your vision and bring it to life, ensuring results that exceed expectations and stand the test of time.

items.question: Do you handle planning permission applications?
items.answer: Yes, we can manage the entire planning permission process on your behalf. Our team has extensive experience with local planning regulations and can prepare and submit all necessary documentation to maximize the chances of approval.

items.question: How long does a typical extension project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on size and complexity. A single-story extension typically takes 10-14 weeks from groundworks to completion, while larger projects may take longer. We'll provide a detailed timeline during the quotation process.

items.question: Do you offer guarantees on your work?
items.answer: Absolutely. All our building work comes with a comprehensive workmanship guarantee, typically for 10 years. Specific materials and fixtures may also carry manufacturer warranties, which we'll pass on to you upon completion.

items.question: Can you help with design ideas and suggestions?
items.answer: Yes, our experienced team is happy to provide design input and practical suggestions based on your requirements and budget. For more complex projects, we can recommend architectural services or work with your chosen designer.
